info.bunji.jdbc.specifics

Interface RdbmsSpecifics

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRdbmsSpecifics, OracleRdbmsSpecifics

    public interface RdbmsSpecifics
    Author:
    f.kinoshita

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String formatParameterObject(Object object)
      Format an Object that is being bound to a PreparedStatement parameter, for display.

    • Method Detail

      • formatParameterObject

        String formatParameterObject(Object object)
        Format an Object that is being bound to a PreparedStatement parameter, for display. The goal is to reformat the object in a format that can be re-run against the native SQL client of the particular Rdbms being used. This class should be extended to provide formatting instances that format objects correctly for different RDBMS types.
        Parameters:
        object - jdbc object to be formatted.
        Returns:
        formatted dump of the object.
